8001.name: The Mountain Pass
8001.description:
The path winds ever upward through jagged peaks. The air grows
thin and cold. Far below, the world stretches out like a map.
Ahead, a cave mouth glows with inner fire - the lair of the 
legendary dragon Scorathax. A swirling portal of chaotic energy
hovers high above, leading to another plane of existence.

north.description: The way leads to The Dragon's Gate

south.description: A treacherous mountain path descends toward the desert caves below.

up.description: A swirling portal of chaotic energy leads upward to another plane.

8002.name: The Dragon's Gate
8002.description:
Massive stone pillars frame the entrance to the dragon's lair.
Ancient draconic runes warn all who approach. The ground is scorched
black, and the bones of previous challengers litter the area. Heat
emanates from within.

south.description: A steep trail ascends to The Mountain Pass

north.description: The way leads to The Treasure Cavern

8003.name: The Treasure Cavern
8003.description:
Mountains of gold, jewels, and magical artifacts fill this vast
cavern - the accumulated hoard of centuries. The wealth here is
beyond imagination. And coiled atop it all, awaiting challengers...

south.description: The way leads to The Dragon's Gate

8000.name: The Edge Of Chaos
8000.description: Reality seems to fracture at the edges here. Colors shift and blend in impossible ways, and the ground beneath your feet feels unstable, as if it might dissolve at any moment.

8099.name: A Rift In The Planes
8099.description: A shimmering rift hangs in the air, connecting this plane to another. Chaotic energy crackles around its edges.

8003.long_desc: A colossal red dragon coils atop a mountain of gold, eyes blazing with fire.

8098.name: charred skeleton
8098.long_desc: The charred remains of an adventurer lie here, one bony hand still clutching a scorched journal.
8098.description: The skeleton is fused to the rock by dragonfire. Whatever killed this person did so in an instant. A partially legible journal lies open beneath the skeletal fingers.

talk_responses.hello: You read the charred journal: 'Day 12 — The dragon sleeps on a hoard beyond imagination. Its breath melts stone. We tried the eastern approach and lost three men. The ONLY safe path is from below, through the caves. The beast is blind in its left eye — always strike from the left. If you're reading this, I failed. Don't repeat my mistake — bring fire resist—' The rest is burned away.
talk_responses.journal: The journal's final legible entry reads: 'The scales are weakest at the belly. We needed acid or enchanted weapons. Mundane steel just bounced off. Gods forgive us for trying with iron swords.'
talk_responses.default: The skeleton grins its eternal grin. The journal flutters in a hot updraft.
talk_responses.next: Faint words appear in the skeleton's scorched journal: 'For those who survive the dragons, only two challenges remain — Castle Apocalypse, where Sir Aldren leads his endless crusade, and the Tunnel of Sticks, where reality itself is a weapon. These are places for the mightiest heroes alone.'

8099.name: lizardfolk observer
8099.long_desc: A lizardfolk crouches here behind a heat-blackened boulder, watching the domain with slit-pupiled eyes.
8099.description: Its scales are an unusual deep crimson, adapted to survive near volcanic heat. It carries no weapons — just a leather satchel filled with charcoal sketches of the dragon.

talk_responses.hello: The lizardfolk speaks in a rasping hiss. 'I study the great one. For years now. It flies at dawn and dusk — that is when the lair is empty. The hoard draws fools like moths to flame. Be smarter than a moth. The dragon remembers every coin. Steal even one, and it will hunt you across the world.'
talk_responses.dragon: It flips through charcoal sketches. 'The great one is ancient. Intelligent. It speaks, if you can survive long enough to listen. Some say it guards something beneath the hoard — not treasure, but a seal. What it seals... I dare not guess.'
talk_responses.default: The lizardfolk watches the sky nervously, sketching something in charcoal.
